title: WTB: N172 John Weyhing paying well for it

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 John Weyhing paying well for it
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone I am still hunting a N172 John Weyhing.  Any pose, or team designation doesn't matter if it is Columbus or Philadelphia.  I have the funds currently to go after a nice one so I figure now is the time to ask for one.  If anyone has one please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks everyone

Tony Turner
